long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With just a few clicks, you can easily generate a QR code directly from your browser while have the ability to search using Yahoo.

Our Chrome extension is the ultimate QR code generator, designed to simplify the creation process for users of all experience levels. With our extension, you can generate custom QR codes in seconds, with a range of customization options to make your code stand out. Need to share your website, social media profiles, or contact information? Our extension lets you create codes for any purpose, and makes it easy to scan and share them with others.

In addition to the ability to generate QR codes, the extension also includes a search function that uses the Yahoo search engine. This allows users to quickly search for information on the internet without having to open a separate tab or window.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the QR Generator Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Yahoo as described by the service in the Terms of Use -  https://qrgenerator4me.com.com/terms
and Privacy Policy - https://qrgenerator4me.com.com/privacy.
